parties: Kankanige Sumedha Indika    Vs    The Hon. Attorney General,
keywords: Discovery of contraption with 24 small cellophane parcels containing heroin mixed powdered substance hidden in the rectum of a prison detainee - Issue as to whether the powdered substance was genuinely in the possession of the appellant at the time of his arrest.
legistation: -Section 54A(b) and (d) of the Poisons, Opium and Dangerous Drugs Ordinance (as amended by Act No. 13 of 1984)
